data.title: A look of iconic heritage for the versatile NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2 (SE)
data.meta_description: A look of iconic heritage for the versatile NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2 (SE)
data.text:
Nikon announces the release of the compact and lightweight NIKKOR Z prime lens in a new design

SINGAPORE – The latest addition to the NIKKOR Z lens line-up, in complement to the Nikon Z fc, the NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2 (SE) prime lens has been announced by Nikon Singapore Pte. Ltd. today.

The prime lens, compatible with mirrorless cameras of the Z mount, the renowned largest mount the industry for better light performance, inherits its design from the classic NIKKOR lenses released around the same time as the Nikon FM2 film SLR camera.

“The design of the lens, with “(SE)” in its naming in reference to ‘Special Edition’, expands the choice of lenses to aesthetically match the equally distinctive design of the Z fc – unique and iconic. Weighing at approximately 170g and a total length of approximately 45.5mm, the versatile and compact lens delivers stunning expressions for both stills and videos,” said John Young, General Manager of International Marketing, International Business Division of the Imaging Group, Nikon Singapore Pte. Ltd.

The NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2 (SE)’s optical performance is the same as that of the NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2. Suited to a wide variety of scenes and subjects, including portraits, landscapes and snapshots, the standard angle of view offered by the lens’ focal length provides creators with an absolute ease to bring it along on any outing and travel. When used with an APS-C size/DX-format camera, the lens offers a mid-telephoto angle of view equivalent to that of a 60mm lens (in 35mm [135] format).

NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2 (SE) Primary features

Beautiful round-shaped bokeh produced by a 9-blade iris diaphragm and accompanied by a bright maximum aperture of f/2

For an angle of view that is neither too narrow nor too wide for portraits, the focal length becomes 60mm (equivalent to 35mm [135] format) when mounted on an APS-C size/DX-format camera.

Compact and lightweight to carry along anytime with its total length of approximately 45.5mm and weight of approximately 170g.

Great for food shots or any subjects to stand out three-dimensionally with large bokeh in the background from a minimum focus distance of 0.29m to get close to their subjects.

Fast and accurate autofocus with quiet operational sounds, while maintaining a compact body size, from the adoption of a stepping motor (STM).

Designed with consideration of dust- and drip-resistant performance*.

Functions such as aperture and exposure compensation can be assigned to the control ring.

Designed with consideration for video recording, including vlogs and streaming, with a quiet operation, effective focus-breathing control, and stable exposure.

Availability

For more information on the new NIKKOR Z 40mm f/2 (SE) and other Nikon products, please visit https://nikon-asia.com

ABOUT THE NIKKOR BRAND

NIKKOR is Nikon's brand of photographic lenses. The NIKKOR name arose from adding "r", a common practice in the naming of photographic lenses at the time the name was established, to "Nikko", the Romanized abbreviation for Nippon Kogaku K.K., the original name used when the company was established. In November 2018, Nikon announced its milestone achievement of 110 million in total production of NIKKOR lenses for Nikon interchangeable lens cameras.

In November 2023, Nikon celebrated its 90th anniversary for NIKKOR, which has grown into an internationally recognised brand that pushes the boundaries of imaging excellence.

ABOUT MY NIKKOR

Every photographer has a story to tell. Enter a world shaped by the creative vision and expression of Nikon photographers. Visit MY NIKKOR (mynikkor.com) to be inspired by their passion and adventures and let NIKKOR connect you with the culture of photography.

ABOUT NIKON

Nikon is the world leader in digital imaging, precision optics and photo imaging technology and is globally recognised for setting new standards in product design and performance for its award-winning consumer and professional photographic equipment. Nikon Singapore Pte Ltd distributes consumer and professional digital SLR cameras, NIKKOR optics, Speedlights and system accessories; Nikon COOLPIX compact digital cameras; Nikon sports optics as well as the latest mirrorless cameras in over 50 countries.

For more information, visit https://nikon-asia.com, or discover the Z series mirrorless camera system and experience new possibilities here, http://nikn.ly/Zseries.

Connect with Nikon and other photographers on Facebook at www.facebook.com/NikonAsia, Instagram at www.instagram.com/NikonAsia, YouTube at www.youtube.com/NikonAsia and LinkedIn www.linkedin.com/company/nikonasia.
